mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (ID, PWD, NAME, DIVISION, JOIN_DATE) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, 'ROLE_A', systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT UI.PWD FROM USER_INFO UI WHERE UI.ID = #{id}

SELECT * FROM USER_INFO UI WHERE DIVISION = 'ROLE_M'
AND UI.ID LIKE '%' || #{searchId} || '%'
AND UI.PHONE LIKE '%' || #{searchPhone} || '%'
AND UI.EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchEmail} || '%'
AND JOIN_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{searchRegDateStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND JOIN_DATE < TO_DATE(#{searchRegDateEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
